about_the_game:
In this game, you find yourself trapped in a seemingly endless parking lot, with the only goal: to escape by reaching Floor Zero. But beware, this is no ordinary parking lot. It's a twisted maze that loops infinitely, playing tricks on your mind and senses.

If you se an anomaly... turn back!
If you don't... then continue.

KEY FEATURES:

Anomalies Detection: Pay close attention to your surroundings. The key to escaping lies in detecting subtle anomalies. Choose wisely - turn back if you see one or continue if you think there are none. Your observation skills are the key.
Infinite Loops: Each journey through the parking lot is unique. The anomalies change, keeping you on the edge of your seat.
Psychological Horror: Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of suspense and dread, with sound design and visuals crafted to unsettle and engage.

GAMEPLAY

Intuitive Mechanics: Simple controls focused on exploration and decision-making.
Short but Intense: Playtime varies from 20-60 minutes, offering a dense and memorable experience.
Replay Value: Multiple playthroughs are encouraged to discover all anomalies and hidden secrets.

COMMUNITY AND SUPPORT

Stream-Friendly: We welcome and support both individual and corporate streamers. Feel free to monetize your streams using platform-provided functions.
Engagement Request: Help spread the word! Include our game title in your stream titles and a link to this Steam page in your descriptions.

OPTIONS AND ACCESSIBILITY

Customizable Experience: Adjust graphics settings, mouse sensitivity and more for optimal comfort.

name: Escape Floor Zero Demo
short_description: Trapped in an infinite parking lot, your only escape is through Floor Zero. Detect subtle anomalies and make crucial decisions in this mind-bending, psychological horror experience. Dare to escape the unescapable? If you see an anomaly... turn back.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
